content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: granite_slab
inventory=[{"type": "spider_eye", "quantity": 6, "index": 11}, {"type": "purple_dye", "quantity": 14, "index": 13}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 23, "index": 17}, {"type": "red_mushroom", "quantity": 45, "index": 18}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 3, "index": 25}, {"type": "acacia_slab", "quantity": 58, "index": 27}, {"type": "tall_grass", "quantity": 55, "index": 33}, {"type": "melon", "quantity": 13, "index": 39}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 38, "index": 40}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 3, "index": 41}]

thought: To craft granite_slab, I need to craft 4 granite. Granite requires placing 1 diorite and 1 cobblestone side by side in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the diorite from slot 25 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: granite_slab
inventory=[{"type": "diorite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spider_eye", "quantity": 6, "index": 11}, {"type": "purple_dye", "quantity": 14, "index": 13}, {"type": "stripped_birch_log", "quantity": 23, "index": 17}, {"type": "red_mushroom", "quantity": 45, "index": 18}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "acacia_slab", "quantity": 58, "index": 27}, {"type": "tall_grass", "quantity": 55, "index": 33}, {"type": "melon", "quantity": 13, "index": 39}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 38, "index": 40}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 3, "index": 41}]
thought: Since the diorite has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the quartz to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the quartz to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 2 with quantity 1
